website_summaries.verdict: A large, plush microfiber towel that will buff your car in no time.
pros: Thick towel measures 16x16 inches and highlights dirt so you know when to flip it
Professional-grade material made with 450 gsm microfiber for maximum softness
Towel has no seams, tags, or edges to prevent streaking and scratching
cons: Some users commented that the towels were too large to handle fine details properly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Lint, lint and more lint. Do not by these. Yes they are fluffy and soft but if your trying to dry or polish your car they just leave a trail of lint on everything they touch. I tried them straight out of the package. Then washed them in washing machine. Both times lint everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: darin grant

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: ... This time, for a friend who also takes his car's appearance seriously. You can't buy a towel of this quality in your typical big chain department store, and not from most auto parts suppliers. These meet my needs for caring for my ceramic-coated car, and for my friends who frequent the same car shows I do. If you have are investing time and money in maintaining your car's finish, don't set you efforts back drying your car with a cheap microfiber towel that will leave fine scratches and swirls. I will only use a premium towel, like the CarCarez Edgeless detailing towel. Use the auto parts store towels to clean your seats ... these are for your car's finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: and they still do a great job actually drying
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away as to how well these towels worked. They soak up so much water, and you can wring them out, and keep going, and they still do a great job actually drying. Just make sure you run them through the wash once or twice before using. Fine little fibers come off the first couple times using, which coats the car windows. After a wash, they're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: I was doubtful.
customer_reviews.text: Expected fuzz, lint etc. Wrong. No fuzz, no lint, absolutely absorbant. Very impressed. Even the windows were dried without a smear of water being left behind. Very soft, very thick - thick like my fleece bathrobe. I am buying a second pack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. You'll use probably use 5 of these for a complete dry of your car because of their size (16" square). The first three will absorb an amazing amount of water and with a few wringings out will get the car fairly dry. Use the final two to get every last bit of water and eliminate any water spots. Best part: absolutely no lint or material left behind like when using a cotton towel. They're also awesome for indoor dusting. Give a light misting with water (or not, opinions on this vary) and go to town on dust. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: QuantumMechanic

customer_reviews.title: Great edgeless towel!
customer_reviews.text: Really great towels. The no edge of the towels is really amazing and they make me want to wash my car everyday because of how soft they are. Will definitely be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my Harley nice and shiney!
customer_reviews.text: As a long time multi Harley Davidson owner I can tell you that I don't use just anything on my bikes. I ordered these based on price and reviews from previous customers and I was not at all disappointed. Towels are very soft, left no streaking and held together nicely. So many these days seem to just fall apart and/or leave lint all over the place but these did not. I think these will become part of my permanent cleaning and detailing kit going forward. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jim"Try my Kool-Aid" Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Its very soft and absorbs well. Took me about 10 mins. to fully dry off my car and buff out sap that fell from a tree onto my hood. Its almost like the tree sap was never there! After I got done with the towels I tried washing them to see how well they would hold up in the washing machine and dryer and they still look brand new. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super plush!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! WAY softer plusher than typical micro fiber cloths. I se these for final shining on paintjobs from buffing and polishing.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Blauer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the microfiber packs from Sams Club, Walmart, etc because to me a microfiber is the same. These are definitely a lot softer than the ones you buy at the stores that I mentioned and I cant believe I’ve been using those cheap ones on my paint.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Lint factory
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the one-star reviews! These towels are the worst lint producers I've ever seen. They leave a layer of fine fibers over the entire car, especially the windows. I actually had to re-clean the car after using them. I've put them through the laundry five times, but that didn't help. They've gone in the trash, and I will not be purchasing any more products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: BluesWest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soft towels
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly awesome towels! Haven't used eagle edgless yet, but i cant imagine how much better they would be over these. No linting when I used them for polish and wax removal. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jserr

customer_reviews.title: Using these to add to my car detailing aresnal and very pleased. Will be getting more
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with how soft fluffy these towels are. Using these to add to my car detailing aresnal and very pleased. Will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lint and poor absorbency
customer_reviews.text: The softness and color are the only things good about this from my experience. It does not absorb moisture and it leaves lots of lint. I wash and dried them hoping that would reduce the lint but it did not. The absorbency was not improved after washing and drying. I was very disappointed with the performance of this brand of microfiber towel. I am using 3 other brands that have excellent absorbency and do not leave lint for my Tesla.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

customer_reviews.title: Thin towel with a long ply
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these towels to care for the finish on my 2019 soul red Miata, it has about 1/4" long ply and works great. The long ply feels like a cushion between my hand and the paint. I used one on a wet night before the car cover went on and it left the finish clean and shiny, picking up some smudges left by my Costco towels. The blue towels actually feel soft on the finish as they're drawn across the car. I like these towels and purchased 6 more. Looks like I'll be busy.
customer_reviews.author: Blu-Ray

customer_reviews.title: Coral weave works great with Rinseless washing
customer_reviews.text: id like to edit/update my original review regarding linting. After a couple washes the towels lint a lot less. What i found out, the type weave (Coral weave) they do tend to lint a little. Even Rag company’s Minx towel (same weave) lint some. Coral weave towels work EXCELLENT with Rinseless washing. The towel feels like a sponge when wet. And of coarse wont lint when wet. Primary use is Rinseless washing, And waterless washing (first wet/wipe). The gray towels i use on my summer wheels. Cant beat the price for the CarCare Towels.
customer_reviews.author: KenMal78

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, left behind tiny fiber on the surface
customer_reviews.text: Not so happy about these towels. Indeed they are soft but too soft. I feel like I can tear them apart, and the most important is they left behind too many tiny fiber on the surface in wet or with spray on wax. Thats a big no no! Looks like few dollar cheaper than the Chemical Guys MIC_507_06. But this towel is 16x16, and the Chemical Guys towels is 16x24. it actually about the same cost vs volume. I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: PK9394Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: There is no comparison by far the softest Microfiber on the planet..
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before I buy anything. First off my car is black and I'm a clean freak especially with my ride. I have used my share of microfibers, chamois,rubber squeegees, blower,etc. I'm telling you for your final pass this towel is the one. It is so soft I cant put into words to describe how soft they are. I used them to remove wax and they do such a great job. As far as drying your car they are not very absorbent. They make up for that for the buffing and polishing they is no better microfiber towel that even comes close to the quality of these bad boys.... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. I will be buying more myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dan c.

customer_reviews.title: These were the worst towels I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These were the worst towels I ever bought.I have never seen a fiber towel leave behind the amount of lint these did.I had to wash car after using these towels to remove lint left behind after waterless wash.
customer_reviews.author: richard oginz

customer_reviews.title: Great towels - exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I've recently become obsessed with using ONR on my car, and these towels are my favorite microfibers for the price that I've used. I get about 2 months of weekly washing / treating / drying before I really start to notice a degradation of the material. I've tried not to dry them on hot (I usually use the delicate setting), so it's possible it's a combination of the products used and the heat. Overall, though - great towels, perfect size, good price. I'll continue buying until I find something I like better or lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Idgie Threadgoode

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a microfiber towel for waterless car washing. I have been using this on my new Tesla 3 for several months now and I am very happy with the results! These towels are very soft and very fluffy. Some lint after the first few uses but it is a minor issue. Overall, using this for waterless car wash makes my car paint feel so smooth and reminds me of when I got the car brand new off the showroom!
customer_reviews.author: Ben H

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lint!!!
customer_reviews.text: On the first few usage there a tons of lint!!! It's very annoying when I'm drying my car. After a good 4-5 washes I finally got it to where there's very little or almost no lint. On a positive note they are extremely soft and won't scratch my car. They are slightly small for the size so I ended up doing a second order of these so I don't run out in the middle or drying my car. They do absorb good. Could be better at absorbing but they do the job decently.
customer_reviews.author: NC2448

customer_reviews.title: Plush. Plush. Plush.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no microfiber expert but these are one of the most plush cloths I've purchased to date. Usually I can't justify "premium" cloths due to the price jump (I normally opt for Amazon's basic verions), but these seem to be worth the buy. Left some lint on the windows (probably need to claybar...) but that's probably error on my end as I did not wash prior to first use. All in all, worked great for spray waxing and quick detailing. Picks up a ton of dirt and they seem to get trapped deep in the fibers, so scratches aren't really a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made and provide great protection for maintenance detailing
customer_reviews.text: I got these to be my regular maintenance MF towels for keeping my cars in good shape with the spray detail products I use. I prefer the longer nap as it once they start to collect stuff, it cushions it away from the top surface better than most other MF towels I have in my arsenal. These are also great for buffing off wax, for the same reasons. The only caveat I have seen - even after washing (with MF specific soap) they still tend to shed a bit more than other MF towels I use.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these towels for my Mercedes!
customer_reviews.text: These towels come very fast to my house, I really appreciate the quickness in shipping! These towels are SUPER SOFT, absorbent and great for finishing off drying your car from a wash! Multiple use for these for waxing, cleaning and many other uses! Even after a few washes I really liked how they hold up and always come out the dryer FLUFFY & SOFT!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Soft towels
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased many different brands of micro fiber towels and these are great!! Would definitely recommend from a person who has detailed cars for over 45-years
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft microfiber towels for a super price.
customer_reviews.text: These CARCAREZ microfiber towels for cars are extremely soft on both sides. As you can see from the picture, there is no boarder around the towels. The CARCAREZ towels come 6 to a pack for almost the same price as the competition. I washed and dried them. No lint in the dryer. No color fading. Still soft as new. If you are looking for a super soft microfiber car towel at a great price, I would recommend giving these CARCAREZ towels a try. Also, the towels arrived ahead of the scheduled delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the "high-end" microfiber clothes selling for much more!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrific thick, plush, edgeless microfiber cloths. Even better quality than the expensive high-end microfiber cloths that sell for much more from the top automotive detailing companies. No issue at all with linting, best to wash separate from other laundry in cold and dry on low setting before first use. Great for your car or in the house. I’ve washed them several times and they’re still like new. Don't think twice, just buy them and you can thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Boulder Bob

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cars shine
customer_reviews.text: I use these towels with Griot's Speed Shine and Best of Show Detailer on my C-7 Corvette and 2017 Camaro ZL1. They are great at the Car Shows as they make detailing so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Balmer

customer_reviews.title: Good towels but leaves micro threads behind on your car
customer_reviews.text: Bought these since these were a little bigger in size and easier to hold. Other towels are too tiny to hold and slip off your hand as you wipe or wax your car. Towels leave behind these threads on the car which are clearly visible on black surface and that too in 2nd use. Its china made so wasn't expecting otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Singla

customer_reviews.title: Best plush microfibers and an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I had my car ceramic coated a while back and these work just as well as the $20 plush microfibers they want to sell you. I use these mostly for removing bird poo with the ceramic safe detailing compound they give you and it’s perfect. These lift dirt and debris very well and I never worry about leaving micro abrasions on my paint.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They suck. They are super soft and seem well made, but they shed like crazy. I use them to wipe off spray wax, after I wash my car, and it leaves fibers all over the car. I washed them thinking that might help. Not at all. Cheap. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E. Seeger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality microfiber car towels
customer_reviews.text: Love these CarCarez towels! They came fast and well packaged. The towels are soft and of good quality and a beautiful blue color! They seem to be built to last for a long time. My husband and my daughter like them a lot. tried them today and they absorbed water well. Can’t wait to use them on our precious cars. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DK/WW

customer_reviews.title: They’re just as soft as a nice blanket. They soak up all the liquid on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than I expected. They’re just as soft as a nice blanket. They soak up all the liquid on the surface and pull any debris up and away from it. I could imagine these getting pretty wet if you dry a whole car, but the 6 included will do the job without a problem. Highly recommend from a petrolhead like me!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They wipe down nice after you put the wax on the car they are so nice to work with I will be buying more in the future....thankyou.....roger also buy the butter wax from the chemical guys it’s a dee shine easy to work with....
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend subscription to this product, I don’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Not really meant to be absorbent, more for polishing or cleaning delicate surfaces. Perfect for my home electronics and keeping the bike and car clean. Surprised the material locks in dust particles so no transfer on different surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: GI JOEY

customer_reviews.title: soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for soft and plush and durable and I think I got that with these. Also getting a larger supply, more than three or four, means having enough to dry, clean and wax all parts of the car at once before adding to the clothes washer.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: Try it you’ll like it
customer_reviews.text: I love these microfiber towels are use them for everything I got them for the car but I wash the windows with them dust with them clean my glasses off with them clean my stainless steel refrigerator you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KIMMIE IN KANSAS

customer_reviews.title: Softer than most
customer_reviews.text: Very soft towel. I use it for car detailing and it is softer than the micro fiber you get in big bags at auto supply store. The are not the best for cleaning, but the best by far for drying and polishing.
customer_reviews.author: J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: would not buy, too much lint
customer_reviews.text: considering most people look at this to detail their cars, I would not recommend this at all. there is way too much lint on the product which makes it pointless to detail the car with, since it leaves trails of lint all over the area you used this on. does not work well on paint or glass, and still has a ton of lint after a wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Seowon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lint
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feeling towel, very soft. Only problem is they leave lint on everything they touch. Tried them strat out of the bag and have washed them several times. Nothing helps. My Jeep is black so the lint is very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They okay
customer_reviews.text: Not the best microfiber towels. They leave to much cotton or little fibers behind when you drying something. Update- the company contacted me to fix this issues and they offer to replace the towels. Great costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: marco cabrera jr

customer_reviews.title: very thick and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wash/dry car. These towels are very thick and absorbent, the only downside is when I used them to dry the car, they left lint on my black car. Hopefully washing them will remedy this problem.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: clouds in your hands
customer_reviews.text: After all the years of washing & waxing my vehicles this product is amazing. Using the rags to wash and dry before waxing was just what i needed to prep before waxing. They really absorb and hold the water well. Thanks to ( sweet car project site ) i was able to find the right rags and they were well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: harry j.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to pick the blue ones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping they would be good enough for rinseless washing and they are perfect. Compared to the RC's eagle edgeless, it's very hard to tell the difference. Keep in mind that the ones I'm talking about are the blue ones, the other options are not of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and absorbent, I recently bought a new vehicle and needed some cloths to detail my ride. These are just what I needed and so far they haven't started to unravel when washing. Seems like a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: If you care for your car finish, this is your rag
customer_reviews.text: I paid big money for a finish on my black truck. I wanted wash clothes that would help me take care of it. These are soft, absorbing, tough and the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller replaced with their improved microfiber and it is much better
customer_reviews.text: My original microfiber was replaced by the seller free of charge. I washed the towels as I do all my microfiber before I use them and let them air dry. These towels are much better and do not leave any lint on your paint. Much improved, the nap seems to be where they made the improvement and it doesn’t release the the fine threads as the originals did. I have to say that I am impressed that the fixed the issue and replaced my original product. I will be purchasing more microfiber from them in the future
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hill

customer_reviews.title: Grrr...
customer_reviews.text: Found this defect just after using it for the first time to wipe down hood. Don't know how it got there but it scratched the film coating i had installed on my very new car. Super pissed.
customer_reviews.author: JC in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Lint Lint and more Lint
customer_reviews.text: Leaves behind a trail of lint on freshly polished paint. It made for double the work to remove with extra spray Sealant. The best bet is to wipe in one direction. No the best on the market at all, great YouTube marketing.
customer_reviews.author: shizhen jia

customer_reviews.title: Not all Microfiber is created equal
customer_reviews.text: Quite buying the fiber and the auto parts store and start buying these. You can telll the fiber is different, their thick, supple and they work. Maybe a little more expensive, but if you're a car guy, or what ever you use it for, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Wet or dry, after using these for a couple of months they have been the best microfiber towels I have purchased from Amazon. I experienced a little bit of lint during the first dry use but After a bucket wash it was gone. I purchased another pack and will order more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a good quality cloth to wipe down surfaces. Well my search is over. These cloths absorb lots of moisture which is good. It sucks up all the dust and grime. Bought 2 packs and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very soft microfiber towels, absorb water very fast and less wiping when waxing your vehicle, I love this product. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: 6IX

customer_reviews.title: Good quality edgeless microfiber towel
customer_reviews.text: "Because of the edgeless design, the towels are scratch-free. But the edge is uncovered in the meantime, the edge can be affacted directly. The towel surface is good quality, sturdy and durable, will not leave lint, unless they absorb some lint when producing. Washing before first use will solve it. But the towel will left some lint when you use a big power to pull the edge, or the edge was broken. I washed the towels before using. My towels did not left behind lint when i dry my car, and everywhere is clear after using it."
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these, having a black car water marks are very visible if not dried after washing. This product is very soft making it a great cloth for a black vehicle, no scratches or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brandan

customer_reviews.title: Lint Shedding
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more reviews before purchasing. These shed lint. Terribly. Straight out of the packaging. I purchased these to use for drying, but I had to switch towels immediately as these were leaving my paint dirtier than pre-wash. On top of that, these don't seem terribly absorbent, either, making them a poor choice for drying. I'll be looking for an alternative now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Matthew Culp

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces of lint everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother with these towels if you want that pristine look for your car. Upon closer inspection of my car after I dried it I noticed many specks of lint all over the car. Thought maybe the towels need to be run through the laundry a few times. After multiple cleans, the lint still appears here and there. Do not buy these towels if you’re ocd about your cars exterior. I didn’t give this product 1 star because the towels are very good for drying things so I will find other uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lin

customer_reviews.title: Automotive Microfiber Towels
customer_reviews.text: The towels are very soft and light. It has taken several washes to get them to be absorbent. The towels cause streaking until they begin to absorb the water then they work pretty good. I have found them more useful for dusting my car after use and to help remove wax residue.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best towel
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product.....used for detailing work on my truck. Used together with their spray wax, the results are truly satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: leslie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try these towels and now wish I would not have bought. The quality is just not there. seem cheap and they are . Get what you pay for. Will buy the Griot Garage brand next time. Texture and quality much better.
customer_reviews.author: BadDog04

customer_reviews.title: Blue pieces everywhere, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this for waxing or even liquid wax, blue fabric falling apart everywhere. Maybe try washing it first, but don’t use it for waxing, definitely a drying towl, at best. I wouldn’t use it for that though either if you care about your clear coat I would get something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Microfiber Towels
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my 2 very high end cars knowing they will not scratch them. Best fabric I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: docloc

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe trucks are 05&10
customer_reviews.text: Just love them, I buff my trucks street rod and they make my job alot easier and really pops out the shine
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Lint Lint Lint.
customer_reviews.text: After washing these towels, I gave these a try. I used them to attemp to remove a ceramic spray coating. They left so much lint, I had to toss them to the side and use my other towels.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Plush microfiber cloths.
customer_reviews.text: I use these things for just about everything. These are especially nice because they're so plush.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these towels not only for my car but also for house cleaning. I like their softness and since they can absorb the water really well, areas cleaned by it get dried almost immediately! It's a good value for the the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for rinseless washes
customer_reviews.text: These towels have a good gsm for multiple purposes but I noticed they leave some lint behind that makes paint and look oily or scratched up after removing spray wax. They do hold a good amount of solution for rinseless washing, can around wheels easily and tighter areas than a glove or pad can’t do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing -- very linty
customer_reviews.text: These work OK in terms of functionality. BUT no matter how I washed them, they were ALWAYS very linty. They left lint no matter where or how I used them. They have been demoted to wheel duty now. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but they shed
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but these shed and leave little fibers everywhere, even after a trip through the washing machine. Good for drying your car and general cleaning, but I wouldn't recommend for windows or polishing.
customer_reviews.author: DarthMuffin

customer_reviews.title: Softer not more absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are softer than a shorter pile microfiber but not more absorbent. Has not bled dye on other towels.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Towels
customer_reviews.text: I really like these towels. they are very soft, and wont scratch paint. I bought them for detailing my $75.000 F-350, Black. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Greer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a lot of lint on the car.
customer_reviews.text: Never ever buy these towel because it leaves hell lot of lint on the car especially on the glass surface. I used to wipe the front windshield and now it is full of permanent lint stuck on it and I have to drive with that linty windshield. I tried to clean it many times but it never got cleaned. So ease don't but these you will save money and your car.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Lint, Lint, and more lint
customer_reviews.text: Nice, soft towel. No seams on the edges, but there is blue lint on everything. Stick to the Chemical Guys microfiber towels for detailing.
customer_reviews.author: John VB

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Adjunct for Car
customer_reviews.text: I need some soft, absorbent and light towels to help cleaning and detailing my car. They work great. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: lscot

customer_reviews.title: Best Towels for Drying Cars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and just used them to dry off my Lexus NX300. 6 towels weren't enough so I just ordered another 6. WOW!!! THESE TOWELS ARE AWESOME YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Quality cloths
customer_reviews.text: Not all microfiber cloths are created equal. These are high quality items.
customer_reviews.author: Bike mad

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different brands of microfiber towels through the years. I like these the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: Great value, so far.
customer_reviews.text: Really thick and plush. Haven't washed them yet, so don't know how they will be after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Eagle Edgeless towels but half the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought these because I needed some cheap secondary towels for my car. To be honest, for the price I paid for it I expected some fraying or slightly grabby fibers, but these turned out to be super plush with no tags or frayed edges. These Chinese towels are actually on par with my Eagle Edgeless towels by the Rag Company and cost half the price, and you get 6 in this pack vs 5 with TRC. I normally purchase my MF towels from the Rag Company or Chemical Guys when they have really good sales, but I must say that CarCarez definitely has my attention with these well made towels.
customer_reviews.author: Sad Blue Squid Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great towel
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for both drying and buffing a cars finish! Extremely absorbant and did an excellent job buffing as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JACLYN

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lint everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent, but I would not recommend it. Even straight out of the packaging, it will leave tons of lint all over your paint. I have. Black car, so its even more noticeable. I would suggest finding a more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, and great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, thank you! These are great drying, and buffing towels. The price is fantastic. The quality is 100%! I will definitely be buying more when when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: The Chef

customer_reviews.title: LINT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Left lint on car - defeats entire purpose - sorry Charley
customer_reviews.author: George Everlast

customer_reviews.title: no scuffs or streaks
customer_reviews.text: very happy of the tenderness these clothes on a very tender paint job, no rub marks or scuff no better product I've used to date. thanx
customer_reviews.author: Cindy  I. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product / works well especially for polishing
customer_reviews.text: Product is soft doesn't scratch the vehicle like a regular towel. Does a great job removing polish/ wax and giving surface a nice shine for the money you can't beat them . Haven't washed them yet so I will have to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are good and soft and really are good for the car waxing enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Richard Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money
customer_reviews.text: These towels are the best bang for your buck. I use them to dry my car, clean stainless steal, mirrors, you name it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Great towels. Even after a few washes they remained fluffy. You will definitely want to give them a wash fresh from the factory because they will lint if you don’t. Great value and amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Auto Detail LLC

customer_reviews.title: Thick and soft....BUT......
customer_reviews.text: After using these towels I discovered a constant lint problem. I wash the towels on cold setting with no softener and a cool dryer. They leave a fine layer of static clinging lint. Not a good buy for a dark car.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: CarCarez microfiber towels
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I love these towels, I am very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbant but LOTS of LINT!
customer_reviews.text: Beware these leave LOTS of LINT! They are very aborbant and soft but they leave lint like crazy! I tried shaking them out after I realized how much lint they left thinking it might make it tolerable. Nope, used and washed twice, still lint like crazy. These will now be used for rim/tire cleaning. I won’t touch my paint or glass with these again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barber

customer_reviews.title: Like yellow fiber in your wax?! You've found the right towel!
customer_reviews.text: Not for black cars, leaves yellow lint behind like crazy. Disappointed with this product, literally are the only towels I've had that do this. On the other hand, they are very soft and supple, may be suitable for other tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: These fluffy microfiber towels are hands down the best. They absorb so much water and they ring out very easily. Super soft when doing just a quick detail spray I love them. For painted areas of your vehicle I don’t think it’s possible to go wrong using these towels.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Is good for cleaning the body of the car, but when it comes to windows. It leaves a lot of fuzz or hairs from the towel and it takes me longer and is hard to wipe it off. so, with a cotton towel...%100 cotton towels are best...save the money & get the towels instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Plush
customer_reviews.text: Super soft for vehicle detailing, washing and drying. I used it on my Harley.
customer_reviews.author: RazorX9

customer_reviews.title: I love these drying towels
customer_reviews.text: I love these drying towels! I have a Ram 1500, and drying it, can be an ordeal. But with these towels, it was effortless. My only criticism, I would like the towel to be larger. Other than that, for the price, I strongly recommend purchasing the towels!
customer_reviews.author: Roger W Sonsini

customer_reviews.title: Enough to dry a SUV.
customer_reviews.text: These towels work great for drying my Escalade. One pack is enough to dry a full size suv. You may need to ring out a couple rags and use one for final whipe of the windows. thanks to chrisfix
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Do just exactly what they were intended to do! Dry car off/take off wax,and even buff!
customer_reviews.text: The thickness and size are perfect for drying/cleaning,and taking off wax when I detail my Camaro SS.You do not have the chance of the finnish getting scratched either!
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: leaves lint on all car surfaces, glass, paint
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are soft. Pre washed clothes left lint fibers on new windshield inside and out, uggh. I will use for rags. The lint fibers hard to remove. I used my expensive Norwex Enviro Cloth to remove fibers.. I will not buy CARCAREZ microfiber clothes again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CarCarez Premium Microfiber Towels, Car Drying Wash Detailing Buffing Polishing Towel with Plush Edgeless Microfiber Cloth, 450 GSM 16x16 Inch Pack of 6
feature_bullets: IDEAL COLOR & SIZE: Light blue color microfiber towels can highlights dirt, shows you when to flip to avoid scratches. 16x16 inch for ideal handling and control while detailing. Pack of 6, which is equal to 10.67 pcs 12”x12” towels

PROFESSIONAL GRADE MICROFIBER CLOTH: Made with premium 450 gsm microfiber which have the softness,absorbency and strength. This plush microfiber towel is extra thick, you can really feel the difference

MULTIPURPOSE: These microfiber towels can be used as car wash towels, window glass cleaning towels, car drying towel, auto polishing buffing towel, finishing towel. They still can be car inside and outside detailing towels when be used with all detailing sprays. They are good at waterless washing, quick detailing, compound, sealant, glaze and wax removal
NO TAGS, NO SEAMS, EDGELESS: It means no streaking, and no scratching! These edgeless microfiber towel feature a sonic cut edge, so they are safe for all surfaces. Plus, it’s 100% machine washable

ULTRA ABSORBENT, SUPER SOFT: These water absorbing car drying towel have dual-sided plush, which can absorbs two times more than traditional cleaning microfiber, so you can greatly reduce the drying time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars693 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
